text:
@DavidYankovich I honestly thought this was going to be a request for a healthy sunburn remedy.  
(Apply cool compresses.  Lightly dab on the soft inside of fresh Aloe Vera.  Avoid the sun for a week at least, uncovered.  Remember to use sunscreen.)

We are not your enemy.
#COVID19 
#WearAMask
